Guard Hector:
The Ivory Tower is a well-knowen hideout for Mystics. They are always up to something! The legend is that long ago, during the Elmoraden Empire, the magicians there controlled the whole continent! Fortunately today we are ruled by a proper King and Lord. It is said that the Mystics resent this...
If you wish to know more, you should visit the Ivory Tower or just ask the Mystics.
